The part on top is a docking port from the station parts expansion mod.

Using Tantares and hoojiwana's RLA Stockalike, I've made my newest crew capsule/space tug. It kinda looks like the Angara capsule, but that was a happy accident, I just wanted to make a 5-kerbal tug for populating space stations. I call it the Big TST, or BTST.

BTST Craft File To use the craft file you'll need RLA Stockalike and procedural fairings.

Cool ships! I made my own little design as well, obviously inspired by the Soyuz:

If Apollo had been Soyuz?

That profile.

To the Mun!

I'll echo the others, this is such a great part set, absolutely a must have. It pairs so well with HGR as well.

Edited August 29, 2014 by DGatsby

This is an excellent mod and suits me perfectly, as I have been trying to recreate Soviet designs with stock parts from the start. So your mod fills my needs perfectly - Soviet designs with perfect stockalike look. However, I think there are a couple issues which could be easily fixed.

The TAC config seems off - the TKS modules pack ridiculously high oxygen levels, so the spacecraft is prohibitively heavy. One TKS module (for one kerbal, not a descent capsule) can clock in to 5 tons when full of supplies. I think that's a little too much and the TAC config should be changed.

I also feel that the complete Soyuz is available too late in the tech tree to be practical. Currently I think you get the capsule and orbital module at the same time as the TKS, which is not true historically (although this is a minor point), but mainly game-wise. I would love to have a two-kerbal capsule (and craft) before I have access to the three-kerbal capsules (stock Apollo-like and TKS). The Salyut could also be there earlier so that we can have early primitive stations to service (and that could later be updated or deorbited).

Of course i could make the changes myself in the cfgs, but I think the mod as a whole would benefit from these tweaks, so please consider them. Thanks for an awesome mod!

Haha I love it!

The rotation of the wheels is quite different! Does that function normally?

Yes

The TAC config seems off - the TKS modules pack ridiculously high oxygen levels, so the spacecraft is prohibitively heavy. One TKS module (for one kerbal, not a descent capsule) can clock in to 5 tons when full of supplies. I think that's a little too much and the TAC config should be changed.

I also feel that the complete Soyuz is available too late in the tech tree to be practical. Currently I think you get the capsule and orbital module at the same time as the TKS, which is not true historically (although this is a minor point), but mainly game-wise. I would love to have a two-kerbal capsule (and craft) before I have access to the three-kerbal capsules (stock Apollo-like and TKS). Of course i could make the changes myself in the cfgs, but I think the mod as a whole would benefit from these tweaks, so please consider them. Thanks for an awesome mod!

This is actually great feedback, many thanks

Tech tree placement has been, I admit, almost totally random so far. I think it's time to take a proper look, and like you say, put some parts a little earlier.

As for the TAC config, I'll take a look, thanks!

The TAC and CLS configs I think I will make default in the next release.

Tantares and SSTO Alchemyst

http://img13.rajce.idnes.cz/d1302/9/9855/9855668_e811471d098d0e17052ee590c2cf3157/images/screenshot64_1.jpg?ver=0

Wow!

That last station is huge, the part count must be high

And actually that SSTO design is gorgeous.

On a side note...

One small thing I have done is shave about 10MB of Tantares GameData footprint by compressing needlessly large textures. There's zero loss in quality, but a fairly substantial saving in memory.

Enjoy!

I look forward to the day when 64-Bit is actually stable...
